format: This data frame contains the following columns:
title: US Car Price Data
description:
Description
U.S. data extracted from Cars93, a data frame in the 
MASS package.

parameters.MPG.highway:
Average number of miles per gallon for highway 
driving
parameters.MPG.city: Average number of miles per gallon for city driving
parameters.Type: Type of car, e.g. Sporty, Van, Compact
parameters.gpm100: The number of gallons required to travel 100 miles
